org.apache.flex.compiler.clients.problems

Class ProblemFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.clients.problems.ProblemFormatter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WorkspaceProblemFormatter

    public class ProblemFormatter
extends Object
    Abstract class that provide useful functionality for formatting and retrieving the localized message of CompilerProblem's.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ProblemFormatter DEFAULT_FORMATTER 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProblemFormatter() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String format(ICompilerProblem problem)
      Returns a readable description of the problem, by substituting field values for named placeholders such as ${name} in the message specified for this compiler problem.
      protected String getMessage(String key)
      Returns message for the specified key using the resource bundle generated for the specified locale.
      static String substitute(String text, Map<String,Object> parameters)
      Resolves the tokens in the text using the key/value pairs in the specified map.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_FORMATTER

        public static ProblemFormatter DEFAULT_FORMATTER

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProblemFormatter

        public ProblemFormatter()

    • Method Detail

      • format

        public String format(ICompilerProblem problem)
        Returns a readable description of the problem, by substituting field values for named placeholders such as ${name} in the message specified for this compiler problem.
        Parameters:
        problem - problem whose message to find
        Returns:
        A localized readable description of the problem.

      • substitute

        public static String substitute(String text,
                Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Resolves the tokens in the text using the key/value pairs in the specified map. Each token in the message is searched in the map's key list and if found, the token replaced with the value of found key.
        Parameters:
        text - compiler message to resolve
        parameters - map that contains key/value pairs used to resolve the tokens in the specified message.
        Returns:
        resolved, token-free compiler message

      • getMessage

        protected String getMessage(String key)
        Returns message for the specified key using the resource bundle generated for the specified locale.
        Parameters:
        key - key to find (should be the class name of the problem class)
        Returns:
        the message associated with the specified key
